TopicTitle: Saving a subassembly so the dacking port is the root.

Articles.Content: Now that I finally got Subassembly Loader working on 0.20, I'm trying to figure a way to make it work with both the Space Junk Cargo bay and the B9 ones. Problem is that the subassemblies won't snap properly to the bay. Is there a way to define which part will be the root node before saving a subassembly?
